General.Name: Stonehorse Energy Ltd
General.Description: Stonehorse Energy Limited operates as an oil and gas exploration and production company in the United States. The company holds working interests in eleven oil and gas wells located in Carter County and Oklahoma. Stonehorse Energy Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Perth, Australia.

1.Name: Mr. David Ross DeLoub B.A., B.Ec (Hons), BA, G.Dip.FINSIA, Grad Dip Bus
